title: CLI Help Config Display Testing Results
details:
Successfully implemented and tested the config file display in CLI help. Test results:

1. With existing config file: Shows "Configuration file: [path]"
2. With specific --config path: Shows "Configuration file: [specified-path]"  
3. With non-existent config file: Shows "Configuration file: [specified-path]" (user knows what it's trying to use)
4. With no config found anywhere: Shows "Configuration: Using defaults (no config.json found)"

All scenarios working correctly. The help display now clearly shows which configuration file is being used or attempted, addressing the user's requirement.
